member.name: T:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity
member.summary: This is a sample activity scope for UiPath.

member.name: P:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity.ContinueOnError
member.summary: ***OPTIONAL*** If set, continue executing the remaining activities even if the current activity has failed.

member.name: P:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity.DebugLog
member.summary: ***OPTIONAL*** If set, write debug log to the specified text file. The intention of this property is to be used during/// development, testing and remediation of bugs for this activity. When testing from UiPath there is no stepping/// through activity code and this allows an activity developer to narrow down where defects are located within the/// code of the activity. It should not be used in production setting to record data pertaining to a particular RPA.

member.name: P:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity.ScopeId
member.summary: ***OPTIONAL*** A sample string out argument named ScopeId.

member.name: M:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor instantiates a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If debug mode is set to true the activity may use some alternate logic to fill in gaps missing from UiPath/// in order to function correctly.
member.param: If true debug logic is applied.

member.name: M:Hansae.HMAC.Activities.ScopeActivity.CacheMetadata(System.Activities.CodeActivityMetadata)
member.summary: Implementing this method is required by UiPath.
